welcome.title: Welcome to my portfolio
welcome.subtitle: Digital solutions tailored for you
welcome.description: I’m a Full Stack MERN developer, building digital experiences that combine design, performance and functionality. I work with people and brands looking for modern, efficient, and creative web solutions.

solutions.title: Tailored Technological Solutions
solutions.subtitle: Developing innovative solutions that adapt to your specific needs.
solutionsTips: Web and mobile development: Creation of websites, mobile applications, and e-commerce platforms.
Attractive design: Modern and pleasant interfaces that enhance user experience.
Performance optimization: Speed and efficiency improvements for optimal performance.
API integration: Connection with external services to expand functionality.
Maintenance and support: Technical assistance, updates, and continuous improvements.
solutions.closing: I am committed to exceeding your expectations and providing you with innovative, high-quality technological solutions. Let’s work together to take your vision to the next level!

ctaFinal.title: Do you want to ask me something?
ctaFinal.subtitle: I'm interested in understanding your needs and your opinion. I want you to be involved in every step of the process so I can deliver a truly tailored solution for you.

footer.description: Development and design of personalized digital solutions, focused on boosting your online presence through technology, creativity, and commitment.

aboutAs.title: About Me
aboutAs.subtitle: Discover my professional journey and expertise

sectionThree.2: Specialized in creating intuitive interfaces with meticulous attention to detail. I prioritize performance, security, and development best practices.
sectionThree.3: Full-stack experience: from conception to deployment. Adaptability to changing requirements while maintaining high quality standards.
sectionThree.4: Passionate about technological innovation. Continuous learning to deliver cutting-edge, efficient solutions.
sectionThree.5: Focused on delivering tangible value through strategic and creative development.
